column2:
On this New Year, enjoy bubble popping fun with penguins and reindeer in Frozen Pop snow !

Bring on your warm clothes and get ready to shiver in a land filled with snow and colorful bubbles – Frozen Pop is the next ultimate bubble shooting saga!

From the makers of Gummy Pop and Bubble Farmer, here comes chilling bubble shooter - Frozen Pop. It’s time for an adventure in snow! Pack your bags, the bus to Frozen Land will leave soon! Match three or more bubbles and pop them in bubble bursting madness. Join Bender the dog and his friends along with their teachers on a school trip and stop the evil Yeti’s devilish plan to ruin the picnic using your bubble shooting skills!

Connect to Facebook and discover thrilling destinations with your friends like the Snow Forest, Rocky Snow Mountains, Winter Carnival and many more. With more than 2000 (and more added every month) bubble bursting levels in the game, we’ll make sure your journey doesn’t end too soon!

Frozen Pop features:

- Burst colorful bubbles by simply matching any 3 of them
- Rescue cute little penguins from the evil Yeti and his partner Howler the Wolf
- Travel frozen places filled with adventure like Valley of Frozen Flowers, Snow Lake & more
- Play as over 6 unique cute characters from Husky to a Reindeer
- Compare your progress with your Facebook friends
- Use amazing powerups like the bomb, lightning ball, & more to clear those challenging levels
- Lots of free rewards to be won daily
- Find different birds and animals in your journey
- Over 2000 free levels with more added every month

Are you ready to survive the zombie apocalypse?

You knew the day would come, and you have been getting ready for this moment. Remember what you have learnt about surviving a zombie disaster and guide your people in this post-apocalyptic adventure.

The world as we know it no longer exists; now it is time to create a new one. It won’t be easy! The zombies are a true plague. They’re not very smart, but they’re everywhere, and they are legion.

Build your own shelter and make it safe. Find survivors and convince them to join you. Together you will be able to improve the shelter and create a new home. Those will be the first steps towards building a new civilization, a new zombie-free world for humans.

But the road to survival is filled with danger. There are no governments, no authorities: anarchy reigns over the world. Survival not only depends on staying away from the zombies, you must also defend your shelter from bandits and thieves. Other survivors have built shelters too, and they see you as a threat. In this post-apocalyptic world, every new settlement that is discovered is considered a threat and treated like a dangerous enemy. Trust is no longer the order of the day – it is an exception.

DEFEAT THE PLAGUE
Lead your squad against the zombie hordes and defeat the undead. Attack their gathering points and collect resources to help your people. Victory in the war against the undead lies in your hands.


FIGHT FOR SURVIVAL
Attack other settlements to survive. Study their defenses, prepare your team, and develop the right strategy to get inside other shelters to steal their resources.

DEFEND WHAT IS YOURS
Train your team to defend your base and configure a defensive system to protect it from the zombies. But do not underestimate survivors! Humans from other settlements will try to plunder your shelter.

RECRUIT SURVIVORS
Find isolated people, and together build a safe place to live, far from zombies and bandits. Assign them roles in the shelter and ask for their help while you leave to collect resources. Turn survivors into heroes in the war against zombies.

NEGOTIATE WITH OTHER SETTLEMENTS
Everyone is an enemy, but it doesn’t have to be that way forever. Contact other refugees and create alliances with them. Building a new world is a tough proposition: you’ll need to negotiate with other shelters to succeed.

BUILD THE BEST SHELTER
The world has come to an end, but that doesn’t mean survivors should live badly. Manage your shelter, improve it to make space for more survivors, add entertainment zones and farming areas. Grow crops, recycle materials, and establish a self-sufficient community.

TAKE THE SURVIVORS INTO THE REAL WORLD

Use the Augmented Reality feature to bring the survivors into the real world. See how they look in the street or in your home, and take a photo with them.


KEY FEATURES:
- Build your shelter from scratch and defend it from zombies and other survivors
- Attack other shelters to get more resources
- Player Vs. Player modes
- Recruit survivors and create a powerful anti-zombie squad
- Chat with other players
- All game modes can be played for free
- Sign in to your Game Center account to save your progress
- Optimized for iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, and iPhone 
- The Augmented Reality feature is exclusive for iOS devices. Compatible with iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air (2017), and iPad Pro.

ZOMBIES is a free online game. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

IMPORTANT NOTES: 
- This app requires an iPad 4 (or newer), or iPhone 6 (or newer),
- An Internet connection is required to play.
_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://codigames.com

column1: Fear the Walking Dead: Dead Run–Tactical Runner
column2:
Fear the Walking Dead: Dead Run Season 2 is now available with brand new levels of this exhilarating tactical runner!

Fear the Walking Dead: Dead Run puts you inside the apocalyptic fall of Los Angeles from AMC’s hit series Fear the Walking Dead. 

Fear the Walking Dead: Dead Run Features:

- The official mobile game of AMC’s hit show

- Run for survival – Annihilate enemies and stay alive as long as you can in a world falling apart

- Exciting Episode Levels – 6 special show levels available, with more coming soon. Relive the most horrific events from the TV series and see if you would survive.

- Play as your favorite characters from the show – 
Unlock Travis, Nick, Madison, Strand, Daniel, Alicia, Ofelia and Chris. Each has their own strengths and weaknesses and come with their own weapons. Will they survive in your game?

- An arsenal at your fingertips – Over 40 weapons at your disposal. Load up with a powerful arsenal of shotguns, rifles, handguns and more.

- Outlive your friends – Connect to see who makes it the farthest through the city. Run past the lurching bodies of your undead friends!

Download for free now!

NOTE: Fear the Walking Dead: Dead Run does NOT run on iPad 2.

Its terrorist warfare,be ready for fast paced fps counter action against killers.

The best fps sniper shooting game of 2017 is here. The mafia gangster and deadly criminals have taken over your army base and killed your troops and have hostages of innocent people on the order of terrorists. You have been assigned to infiltrate the base and kill all the deadly criminals to rescue the innocent people and take your base from the terrorist. It is an ultimate sniper shooting game to kill the mafia gangsters. You have to be sharp and stealth at shooting the enemies and moving forward. In this modern assassin shooting there will be many enemies attacking you at the same time, so be in your best shape and kill them before they kill you!!! Be the best army commando soldier you are and save your base and hostages from mafia gangsters and counter terrorist.

As an army commando soldier, you have to use your sniper guns to kill these deadly criminals. Show why you're called the best army commando soldier by killing them all and be a battlefield hero. It's time to infiltrate the enemies and start killing them to rescuing the hostages in the battlefield. Pick your weapons and get ready to battle with these deadly terrorists. Nobody should get away from your wrath, they have killed all of your army troops. It's do or die situation!! You killed each one of the last terrorists in your base. You as an army commando soldier accepted this mission. As an elite sniper commando soldier officials have provided you with high tech gadgets, equipment, and latest weapons. Kill all the deadly terrorist who has taken over your base, save the hostages and get your base back from these deadly mafia gangster terrorists. This is a challenging mission use your elite shooting and combat skills to survive and complete this mission.

This is a fast paced fps shooting game that will test your reflexes, tactical and combat surviving skills. Experience thrilling action of counter terrorist warfare in the battlefield as you fight in this critical strike ops missions. Attack them in silence is the best way to avoid getting on enemy radar and killing them. You have to fight all of the counter terrorists who has hostages and taken over your base. You will face some of the world worst brutal terrorist and enemy anyone could ever ask for but it won't stop you from killing them. This game has many advanced and latest weaponry for you which will help you to complete mission easily. Choose your mission and start shooting initial level may be easy but gradually it will become hard. What are you waiting for? Download this game and start shooting!!!

Features:

- Thrilling fighting 
- Exciting shooting mission
- Play anytime, anywhere
- Equip weapons, Choose mode, and Choose mission.

- Easy and intuitive controls
- Aim the head, give your enemy the critical strike!

- Addictive gameplay and environment

How to play:
1. Launch the bubbles, eliminate the bubbles when connect three or more in the same color. The more bubbles connecting, the higher scores getting.
2. The transparent bubbles can be eliminated, not so as the stone bubbles.
3. If the elimination happens around diamond bubbles, the diamond bubble changes the color of the specified.
4. When shot by the launching bubbles, the dinosaur egg bubbles turns to be the launching bubbles. 
5. When shot by the launching bubbles, the dyeing pen will dye a line of bubbles the specified color.

Shoot apples off a freaky limbo’s head without harming them or even causing a scratch. The game has several levels and the task difficulty increases as the player completes each level.
Apple shooter is not only a simple, but also a mega fun game to play. You’ll be having a limited arrows to hit the specific target, so the player needs to be cautious and take the aim carefully to maintain the real symbol of true marksmanship

- Excellent animation effects with beautiful colour theme backgrounds
- Intuitive one-touch controls combined with innovative level design
- Realistic HD graphics

- Drag the bow, aim target, and release the arrow. The longer you hold back, the more power the shot will have

Apple Shooter 2017 - The most realistic Archery simulation experience!

column1: Omni Duo: Valley of the Crystal Ice Sky - Endless Survival, Earn Upgrades
column2:
In Omni Duo you play as two orbs set out to fly across a icy crystallised planet. You must reach as far as you possibly can without being taken out by one of the many blockades scattered across the way, all while keeping the orbs powered by collecting the energy that floats in from the skies. 

Earn upgrades for the orbs by completing achievements or buy them in game to help you progress further. Complete all 23 achievements to beat the game and be rewarded with the very special final upgrade!

Don't forget to share your high score with friends and check the leaderboard to see how you compare to the best!

column1: Land Pet Pop 2015: Bubble Shooter Match 3 Adventure Free
column2:
Bubble shooter game brings endless pleasure with extremely cute animals. Install and join the adventure right now!

The world of poetic bubbles is an originally beautiful land for magic tales of funny and lovely pets, unfortunately they have got stuck in the bubbles. They are waiting for you to rescue now. Take the adventure with the puppies in order to save the pets in the game Land Pet Pop 2015.

How to play Land Pet Pop 2015:
● Shooting same colored bubbles to explode them. The more and faster bubbles you shoot, the more money, gold you get.
● Shooting bubbles cooping pets to rescue them.
● You pass the level when you rescue all pets.
● There are many supporting bubbles which help you to rescue pets such as: direction bubbles, wizard bubbles, mythological hammers, explosive bombs,…

In this game Land Pet Pop 2015 you will be challenged with 3 different modes, each has 100 levels for you to discover freely:
● CLASSIC mode: There are limited bubbles to rescue your lovely pets, so you must be intelligent and thoughtful. 
● STORY mode: The bubbles drift continuously, you must shoot quickly and exactly to break them and not let them touch the line. In this mode, time and speed is very important so you must strive. The pets will be sad when they are not rescued.
● BONUS mode: This mode helps you to find out a lot of valuable things including direction bubbles, wizard bubbles, mythological hammers, explosive bombs,…. If you pass each levels in the Classic and Story one, you will be rewarded lots of gold coins. The BONUS one needs 2000 gold coins for each level. Play more to get worthy items.

Game’s features Land Pet Pop 2015:
● Charming images, fully attractive colour with so cute and cool animals
● Extremely beautiful bubble design with funny and interesting effects
● The easy and smooth game is compatible for all kinds of machines
	
You can play and show off your achievements with your friends on Facebook, partake with the journey to find out new lands, try to collect challengeable awards… Land Pet Pop 2015 will bring enjoyment and endless inspiration for you. What are you waiting for? If you are a fan of any kinds of egg or bubble games, you must join and enjoy now!

1) 1v0 - Shooting on a goalie
2) Offense Transition - Work through 2v1, 3v2, 4v3, 5v4 situations
3) Fours - 4v4 mini game
4) Horde - Weave through over 10 players!
5) Practice - Want to work on fast breaks? No goalie? Play defense?

- Over 100 stages of many different types  
- Meet cute little characters! 
- Develop various skills and combine them  
- Defeat swarms of enemies with speedy action 

How to play
- Move with the virtual joystick on the left
- Use skills and attack with the virtual joystick and buttons on the right

column1: Bubble Land Pirates: Junior King Treasure Shooter
column2:
Ahoy there Matey! There's only one thing Pirate's live for and that be treasure and loads of it! Jump on board and join the motley crew if you think you dare to ride these rough seas! Roll out the gang plank and load up the firing barrel, there's gold to be had so hoist the sails and lets be out of 'ere! What ye say?

Stand fast and be ready to load up the starboard flinger and aim for those pretty pieces, match 3 or more together, clear the decks and be quick about it! We need to sail on to mysterious lands, storms of pretty pieces of eight are a comin our way, so man that flinger and grab all the gold you can. Word has it there is a treasure chest up for grabs at the end of our journey...if you make it that far matey!

Now just you avoid walking the plank and taking a dunking in the sea, try hauling in extra gold with special timed levels to beat the 'ole whistle clock, grab some barrel aiming lines for that hard to reach treasure, or go for a super fired up deck flinger to power through those pretty pieces. 

Onward Seadog!! Treasure be waiting..

Featuring:

- Free to play, fun challenging gaming
- 100 Levels of landlubber adventure - more coming soon!
- Addictive match 3 Gameplay
- Leaderboards to track progress and share with your friends
- Super barrel Aiming Lines for that hard to reach booty
- Special Timed Levels, Beat the clock!
- Share your best Pirate Treasure Scores on Facebook

Visit us Online:

Facebook: Facebook.com/RisingHighApps 
Twitter: @RisingHighApps 
Web: www.RisingHigh.net

Train your brain and get in on the puzzle game action as you shoot in magical bubbles. This amazing bubble shooter game is very simple and easy to play!
Shoot, pop and blust bubbles to win! 

Game features:
- Amazingly original brilliant graphics
- Burst all bubbles to get target
- Completely free to play, challenging to master!
- Pop 3 or more same with minimum shoots to win 3 stars
- 100+ challenging bubble popping levels

A NEW version of the all known famous Bubble New Land Fantasy is now available for you to download for free.
Shoot and pop all the bubbles with over 800+ levels, by matching 3+ colors to win.

* There are 800 bubble-filled levels to beat.
* Match three colors to pop those bubbles and clear them away.
* Pop them all before your shots run out.
* Change the color of your bubble with a tap.
* Combos and chains score big!

column1: Bubble Pirates - Bubble Shooter puzzle game!
column2:
The first game in the world to combine sea adventure with bubble shooter now is coming for iPhone! 

Unbelievable carefree experience of popping bubbles, amazing and captivating sea adventure, all sorts of special bobble in the images of sea creatures, ALL the above are in our game------bubble Pirates!

Let’s sail on the ocean as a pirate for the shooter adventure! You will experience an incredible and rip-roaring ocean adventure, via collecting unpredictable treasure map jigsaws, picking up shell on the beach, fighting against sea monster to save ocean friends, defeating bad buccaneers, exploring the unknown and looking for hidden treasure at sea etc. while sailing through the exotic Caribbean dreamland

Features:
• Free & Easy to start but challenging to master. Just take aim, shoot bubbles and match the same to pop
• Various amazing sea creature as unique obstacle with joy: starfish, puffer, squid, shell, eel, jellyfish, etc.
• Cute squids bounce the balls enough to get more score. Special squid has more amazing bounce effect
• Bomb, torpedo, rainbow, joker bobble and blitz, unique extra bobble in the silo will help you rip through the pop saga
• 10 combos will bring an extra –exciting bonus time: 5 bomb or rainbow balls!
• Adventure Mode: over 200 levels, over 200 challenge, over 200 different joy
• Challenge Mode: endless challenge, endless joy, shovel coin, extra trophy and gem as rewards
• New and improved pop games features: Collecting jigsaws! Defeating sea monster! Practicing to operate the rudder! Fighting against boss!
• Amazing game settings, awesome graphics, attractive sound and refreshing sense of pop and bounce.

PLUS
- Connect to Facebook, invite and play with friends, present hearts to each other!
- Daily bonus: Continuous login will reward coins, powerful boosters, even gems!
- Weekly competition, extra Easter egg levels, and other funny function is coming!

Are you bored with plain and mindless games? Are you looking for special shoot games? Well, if you like puzzle games, why not try Bubble Pirates and get relaxed and excited with the bouncing adventure at sea! 

Already a fan of AE Bubble Pirates? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter
facebook.com/AEBubblePirates
twitter.com/AEBubblePirates

Please Note! While Bubble Pirates is free to play and enjoy, some in-game items and functions can be purchased for real money. If you do not wish to purchase anything please disable in-app purchases.

DEVELOPER INFO:
AE Mobile Inc. is a developer of top-level puzzle game! We focus on the puzzle game and bring players joy and happiness! Wherever you are, pick up and play now!

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played AE Bubble Pirates!

Survive and defend against a zombie invasion! 

Using the latest AR technology, Zlife brings the zombie apocalypse into the real world, creating a zombie apocalypse game in the real world. Experience a zombie invasion like no other and immerse yourself in the terrifying, tense augmented reality gameplay. Do you have what it takes to survive?
 
A deadly infection has turned the nation to flesh-eating walkers, destroyed society as we know it and created a world of chaos, only a small percentage of the population were immune.
 
These lucky, immune people became zombie hunters.
 
DEFEND AGAINST & HUNT ZOMBIES IN THE REAL WORLD

There is no safe place in a zombie apocalypse - waves of zombies can attack at any moment. Whether you’re in your living room, on your street or in the park with friends, Zlife puts you in the heart of the zombie invasion. Kill the infected zombies around you to survive and earn Zcoins. 
 
BUILD YOUR ARSENAL OF ZOMBIE KILLING WEAPONRY

What’s a zombie hunter without an arsenal of crazy, powerful weapons? Dead – that’s what! Use your hard earned cash from killing zombies to buy a variety of different weapons to hunt down the infected and destroy them.
 
Need to heal or resupply? Visit Zmart outposts dotted around the map to take a load off and get the gear you need. You’ll have to earn it, though.
 
TEAM UP WITH YOUR SQUAD FOR ZOMBIE HUNTING MAYHEM

You know it - life is better when you’re rolling with your squad! Play Zlife with your friends in multiplayer mode and kill zombies together – roll around town, crack some skulls, and gear up as a team. When it comes to zombie apocalypse survival, your chances are better when you’re in a crew with your friends.
 
Want a change of scenery? Quickly teleport to popular destinations across the US to where the action is, or join your friends for some multiplayer zombie wrecking action.
 
===================
ZLIFE – HIGHLIGHTS
===================
- Augmented reality brings the zombie invasion to the real world
- Immersive gameplay lets you hunt zombies wherever you are
- Team up with friends for multiplayer zombie action
- Compete against other zombie hunters for the top spot on the leaderboard
- Use your hard earned coins to purchase weapons – what else?
- Play mini games at Zmarts for supplies and prizes
 
=========================================================
DOWNLOAD ZLIFE TODAY & JOIN THE APOCALYPSE! WE HAVE GUNS!
=========================================================

column1: Land Pet Bubble - Play Ball HD
column2:
This is the most classic and amazing bubble worlds game. This deluxe version is the only one that contains both Puzzle Mode & Arcade Mode.
Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst. Clear all the bubbles to level up.

How to play - Don't use the arrows on the bottom, just tap on the game board where you specifically want the ball. Click the menu key to select levels and other options. There is no witch craft in this game, just stick to the game with patience.

Hello! Ready for some real gangster war? The classic city miami is full of ruthless crooks who wants to take control over all ganglands. Hence, the real crime war begins in between you and grand Mafia of vegas crime city. Whereby, All the cops & police car are chasing Gang of Crime Lands to capture crooks & take them into country jail. However, strive to be a new Godfather of underworld empire. Your mission is to shoot your rival gangs by using advanced Weapon collection of sniper rifle, shotguns, ak-47 and escape police chase. Let them know who is the gang star at miami crime simulator. This sin land is full of terror as these trained bandits are extremely cruel and dangerous to fight.

Extreme Fighting with loaded sniper rifle & ak-47 will surely thrill you to experience this latest breaking crooks in Gang of Crime Lands. Use best shooting guns with 4x telescopic sights with effective range of killing. In this Anarchy gang enemy strike, you will use combat Shotguns having lightweight bolt-Action against grand Mafia crime lords.These deadly criminals are merciless & destroying every place of USA big city. Shoot them with advanced machine guns in open world miami crime simulator. It is the time to show your critical Shooting skills as ultimate Godfather of crime city. Meet other ruthless crooks, fight like real mafia hero to escape police chase for epic gangster clash.

Jack is known as real hero who was criminal boss of his Anarchy gang but his members betrayed him and joined other underworld mafia. They are doing many criminal activities like Robberies, murders, snatching Vehicles to spread terror in other ganglands. Now he has to start his criminal career alone by giving lesson to trained bandits in chase mafia world. He is going at every grand mafia land of vegas crime city to crush & smash his rival gangs for their disloyalty. At the same time all chasing police cars are tend to find and capture crooks. Grab this chance to enjoy epic gangster clash of cops vs gangsters and become high powered gang star at underworld mafia.

Gang of Crime Lands is a random call to every deadly criminal of underworld empire for enemy strike. Change the peaceful land of big city into most deadly gangsters battle hunt. You need to avoid police car chase for survival escape mission in this epic gangster clash as you are the most wanted bandito in crime town.Take miami streets at storm by shooting with sniper rifle, shotguns. You have to win this gangster war at any cost so pay special attention on time bar to complete your target. Be a deadly criminal, don’t let special force team caught you to country jail. Escape cops to take the revenge from crime lords in this chase mafia world. Protect yourself from lethal attacks of gangsters battle hunt war. You need to use your incredible fighting skills  for this impossible crime simulation game. Prove them you are the gang hero in terms of strength or ability at this cops vs gangsters clash. Do or die by breaking crooks at survival escape mission because you are the only gang star having no criminal squad to help.

Prepare yourself to kill these anarchy gang in miami crime simulator of epic gangster clash. Download Gang of Crime Lands to experience real crime war and escape police chase. Attack on these ruthless crooks to exhibit your shooting skill & become the Underworld Mafia hero. 

Game Features: 

» Simple controls with different camera angles
» Thrilling Cops vs Gangsters crime play.
» Classic Miami crime city chase 
» Real gangster underworld battle 
» Multi weapons shooting & fighting
» Amazing graphics with realistic physics.
» Breathtaking 3D Graphics & adventure missions

Park has gates and zombies cannot enter the park except these gates. you have to stop them from entering to the park but if they do try to kill them as early as possible before killing any of the citizen in the lands.

game has exodus levels each level completion unlock the next level. and number of zombies increases accordingly.

features:
